JobTitle: Strategic Finance Associate, Uber Eats - LatAm
JobFullDesc: About the RoleWe're looking for a new member of our Strategic Finance team, supporting our LatAm markets.You will support key processes and projects to help budget, forecast, optimize, and track our financial and operational goals.You will also be driving both local and global analyses to influence and aid the business in key decision making.If you're ready to go deep working on an exciting set of challenges and if you've got the analytical skills, passion, professional dedication and a strong team mentality - read on and get in touch!What You'll DoHelp track financial performance of business on a weekly and monthly basis by P&L Line item.Partner with finance related areas such as Accounting, Tax, FinOps to guarantee correct allocations and other inputs to ensure finance best practices spread through the organizationCoordinate the preparation of monthly decks for different purposes and audiences (i.e. monthly P&L review, LatAm MBRs, Global MBRs, etc.)Assist in the FP&A month end close processEnsure and support developing the approach around compliance towards various company policies (i.e. goal setting, enrolling in company driven initiatives, mentorship programs, etc.)What You'll NeedBachelor's Degree in Business, Economics, Finance, Accounting, Engineering or other quantitative fieldMinimum of 5 years in Corporate Finance / Operational FP&A, Corporate Development / Investment Banking and/or Consulting, at either a high-growth company or a large, well-established organizationA teamwork mentality and an ability to communicate assertively that will ensure positive relationships with cross functions.Intermediate-Advanced SQL: the ability to self-serve, investigate and get the data we require will make you much more effective in this roleSelf-starter: You will take initiative, be dedicated, set and drive toward goalsAttention to detail: consistent with swift and high quality execution. We need to do things quickly, and we need to do them well. Striking that balance can be challenging and this should be a strength of yours.Outstanding Excel/G-sheets & Deck Building skills
